allow: Bash(psql "postgresql://postgres:bHKQdRYMlP7F3VdrO9qPGJRZ+DaYm88z@localhost:5432/vellapanti" -c "SELECT id, alt, ""bottomLeftTitle"", ""bottomLeftDescription"", ""centerTitle"", ""centerDescription"" FROM carousel_images ORDER BY position;")

UPDATE carousel_images 
SET 
  ""centerTitle"" = ''PREMIUM FASHION'',

  ""centerDescription"" = ''BOLD • MINIMALIST • TRENDSETTING'',
  ""bottomLeftTitle"" = ''NEW ARRIVALS'',
  ""bottomLeftDescription"" = ''EXPLORE LATEST DROPS''

  ""bottomLeftTitle"" = ''SHOP NOW'',
  ""bottomLeftDescription"" = ''GET IT BEFORE IT''\''''S GONE''
WHERE position = 2;
